Segment.name: SES
Segment.comment: To identify the particular academic session in which the activity which follows took place

Field.name: DateTimePeriod1
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: DateTimePeriod2
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: SessionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of academic session at an educational institution

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier1
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod3
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier2
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod4
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: LevelOfIndividualTestOrCourseCode
Field.comment: Code identifying level of course, test, or individual

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SES06 or SES07 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SES08 or SES09 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SES11 or SES12 is present, then the other is required.
